abstract: The pastry chef hopes to write and teach, but not work in a restaurant.
snippet: The pastry chef hopes to write and teach, but not work in a restaurant.
lead_paragraph: Michael Laiskonis (shown), who has been the pastry chef at Le Bernardin for nearly eight years, will leave by Jan. 1 to pursue other ventures, including writing a book and teaching.

headline.main: Michael Laiskonis Will Be Moving on From Le Bernardin
